segments.text: Hello , this is the International Youth Hotel . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , yes . I want to check whether you still have any vacancies . I need three single rooms for next Monday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok . There're vacancies . Since the peak season is coming , it's advisable to book soon . Would you like to make a reservation now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , please . Do you take credit cards ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , we accept all major credit cards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: there's free Internet access in the lobby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: is it available in the rooms ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , breakfast is included and parking is available .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you're welcome . And we have 24 hour reception . Please don't hesitate to call anytime if you have any further questions .
segments.speaker: S1
